item.description:
From noon to 3 PM, you can take advantage of the opportunity to sample the services offered by A Place of Light. We offer spiritual conversations, Tarot Card, and healings. From time to time other practitioners are present as well.

The sessions are $10 for ten minutes and we accept cash or credit card.

Light refreshments are available. This is a good time to come and meet with others for good conversation about your experiences with the spirit world!

Please e-mail us if you have any questions!
item.name: Healing Afternoon
